extensionDescription.message: Supports platforms such as GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket, npm, Docker, and more, with quick jumps from the address bar.

default_platform_info.message: If the input does not contain a platform keyword, this platform will be used by default.

enable_omnibox.message: Enable address bar quick commands (open + Space)

auto_jump.message: Auto jump, press Tab to return

enable_dns_intercept.message: Automatically jump for repositories recognized as links

advanced_info.message: The following domains or keywords will not trigger auto-jump.

enter_pattern_error.message: Please enter an address pattern to exclude

omnibox_default_suggestion.message: Enter repository name or package name
